column5: The Claire Villa is one of 4 luxury villas at D6 Retreat. This villa sleeps 6 (2 full beds & full pull-out sofa), has a full kitchen, washer/dryer, access to infinity pool, outdoor games, bird watching, hammocks & hiking on 23 acres. Each villa has luxury linens, memory foam mattresses, pack n play, booster chair, pet bowls, DirectTV, wifi, AC/heat, dishes, and pots/pans.
column8: Claire Villa: Heated pool, Hiking, Games & More
